messages.subject: seeking resources
messages.msgSnippet: Can anyone recommend educational software that would appeal to a 7yo who is just starting to read? I d also like to find some good, fun math software for him.
messages.messageBody:
Can anyone recommend educational software that would appeal to a 7yo who is
just starting to read? I'd also like to find some good, fun math software
for him. He has a MacIntosh that he knows more about than I do, but I am
totally unfamiliar with educational software. All we have right now is
"Jumpstart 2nd Grade" which he seems to be bored with.

Thanks for any suggestions.

Annette
